Blog.post: If you are caring for someone who is chronically ill or dying, check out howtocare.com. It is full of information ...I find something new every time I log on!

I find myself recommending these books often. The first is: To Begin Again : The Journey Toward Comfort, Strength, and Faith in Difficult Times by Naomi Levy. One of the best things about this title is that it is useful during any difficult time, not just grief. Also by this author is Talking to God which is a collection of prayers and meditations that came out of tremendous reader response to the prayers in To Begin Again. If you are looking for a book for yourself or for a friend these are great options.
